name.description: A short name used to identify the test in the UI and for data analysis purposes.

description.description: A short description of the test being run.

system.description: An array that provides a definition for the distributed system under test.

phases.description: A sequence of test phase definition maps. Test phases define the sequence of events for Genesis to perform when executing this test.

timeout.description:
An integer value that specifies how long this test may execute before it should be killed by the test execution system. This value accepts the case-insensitive suffixes ms, s, and m. If no suffix is specified, itâ€™s expected that the value is specified in seconds.

A zero value indicates that no timeout should be enforced for this task.

wait-for.description: The time to wait for until moving onto the first phase
